title: Signals : nerves of the army
creator_credit: Bruce Christie, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: During the war, without communication, the soldiers were sitting ducks. Signalmen, like Bruce Christie, may not have been on the front line, but, as Bruce illustrates, their role was just as crucial to the war.
creator_credit_for_label: Bruce Christie, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
